instructions_to_main_agent: Use 'Manrope' for all headings and 'Inter' for body text. Import them from Google Fonts.
Implement a 'Light Theme' strictly. No dark mode toggle needed as per user request for 'Cores Claras'.
Use the 'Emerald-500' (#10B981) as the primary brand color. It represents the 'filament' and 'organic' nature of 3D printing.
The Hero section must be split: Left side text/CTA, Right side the 'Golden Dragon' image floating with a subtle animation.
Product Cards must be clean: White background, subtle border, image takes up 60% of card height. Price and Title below.
Navigation: Sticky header with Glassmorphism. Links: Home, Shop, Categories, About.
Cart: Implement a slide-over cart (Sheet component) or a dedicated page. Must use localStorage.
Filters: Sidebar on the left for Product Listing Page. Categories, Price Range, Material (PLA, Resin, ABS).
Do not use 'Lorem Ipsum'. Use real 3D printing terms: 'Layer Height', 'Infill', 'PLA', 'Resin', 'Articulated'.
Ensure all interactive elements have 'data-testid' attributes.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
